data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Oita.
Free kick Shonan.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Oita at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Oita are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Oita.
In the minute 15, Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Oita in the half of Shonan.
Throw-in Oita.
Oita needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, Shonan to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Shonan takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 24, Daiki Kaneko scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan are caught offside.
In the minute 28, Naoki Nomura of Oita gets in a strike, but is off target.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Kanagawa.
In the minute 29, Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Oita needs to be cautious. Shonan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 30, Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shonan takes a corner from the left.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
Yuya Takazawa of Oita smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Oita at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Oita drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Oita.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oita to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Shonan push upfield and Naoki Yamada gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Oita defence.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Yuya Takazawa is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Kohei Isa instrumental with a fine assist.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Oita make their first substitution with Tatsuya Tanaka replacing Ryosuke Tone.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Yuki Ohashi hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Shonan.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Yuki Ohashi's header is off-target for Shonan.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In the minute 49, Oita are pushing forward but Yushi Hasegawa's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Oita.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Kanagawa.
Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Kohei Isa.
In the minute 53, Great play from Tomoki Iwata to set up the goal.
Free kick in a good position for Shonan!
Yuki Ohashi (Shonan) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 56, Oita have a goal kick.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Shonan are coming forward and Yuki Ohashi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Kento Haneda is on a sub for Kaoru Takayama for Oita.
Shonan takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 61, Shonan's Koki Tachi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Free kick Shonan.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Shonan in the half of Oita.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Corner awarded to Oita.
The away team replace Kohei Isa with Kei Chinen.
In the minute 70, Yuya Takazawa (Oita) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Kei Chinen (Oita) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Naoki Ishihara is replacing Mitsuki Saito for the home team.
In the minute 72, Hidetoshi Miyuki is replacing Naoki Yamada for the home team.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shonan's Temma Matsuda misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Oita at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
In the minute 81, Oita's Yushi Hasegawa is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Oita.
Oita to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 85, Tatsuya Tanaka of Oita gets in a strike, but is off target.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 87, Naoki Nomura (Oita) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Shonan.
Sosuke Shibata is on a sub for Temma Matsuda for Shonan.
In the minute 89, Toshio Shimakawa is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Shonan.
Shonan's Shota Kobayashi misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Oita drive into the zone and Kei Chinen is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Free kick for Oita in the half of Shonan.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Yuki Kobayashi (Oita) has replaced the possibly injured Toshio Shimakawa.
Oita make their fifth substitution with Yamato Machida replacing Yuya Takazawa.
The home team replace Yuki Ohashi with Shota Kobayashi.
Kei Chinen (Oita) has received a first yellow card.
